ModMetaData.name: RePower UN-Colony Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches UN-Colony production facilities for using the RePower system:
Electric Arc Furnace (400W Idle, 3000W Active) Metalworking Line (10W Idle, 400W Active) Assembly Line (10W Idle, 400W Active) Construction Machinery (20W Idle, 800W Active) Fuel Oil Refinery (10W Idle, 400W Active) Diesel Refinery (10W Idle, 400W Active) Advanced Refinery (10W Idle, 600W Active)
Support-chat here: https://s.team/chat/KUDuzMGR
